summary: A new Dwemer Dungeon with two unique rewards, and one Towering Boss.
descriptionHtml:
-------What is it?-------
If I were to sum up this dungeon in a sentence, I'd say: Short, difficult, and most definitely worth it.
Nthardom is a small Dwemer ruin quite near Raldbthar. Filled with more than a few automatons, it's a challenge for any hardy adventurer - it has the spoils for one too.
During your journey through the decrepit ruin, you'll encounter Nthardium - a huge machine that incinerates any fool that would get anywhere close to it - accompanied by two stout Centurions. This will be rather difficult, so come prepared and at the right level - 25 and upwards should be right as rain.

-------Is There Anything Special in this Mod?-------
Why yes, yes there is.
2 things really, one spell, and one axe.
The Spell:
This will allow you to summon the legendary Nthardium, and have it fight any foe for you. You'll need a Conjuration level of 100 to cast it. Be warned: This can be very over-powered, especially with SkyRe installed. Max out your Conjuration and take the necessary perks, you'll be able to conjure 3 of the guys to aid you. Dragons are no match.
The Axe:
Nthardol's Axe, it is said to have been owned by the Dwemer Nthardol himself - right before all the Dwarves disappeared. Isn't that a coincidence? Anyway, the axe has a few powerful enchantments that someone like you could take advantage of.

-------INSTALLATION-------
It's so very simple. Throw the .esp file into your Data file, or just use the Nexus Mod Manager - it's your choice.

-------Bugs...?-------
Don't worry, no bugs here. But, on the off chance you do encounter any, message me of what you have found and I'll investigate - it will be... fun.

-------Is it Lore-Friendly?-------
Maybe. That's for you to decide.

As always, have fun.
PorkiousMaximus
author: PorkiousMaximus
